info.title: pro-supplier-raw-api
info.description: The REST API allow to serve raw Suppliers.

/suppliers/{supplierId}.summary: Get a supplier by the identifier.

get.summary: Get a supplier by supplier identifier.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description:
Direction of entities sorting :
- ASC
- DESC

get.description:
Find suppliers by description. The pagination is managed by the page parameter and the size parameter.

Note : This endpoint will be deprecated. It is necessary to use `getManySuppliersAsList`.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description:
Direction of entities sorting :

- ASC
- DESC

get.description: Search suppliers containing value in field supplierId or supplierName.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction of supplierDepartment sorting : ASC DESC

get.description: Find suppliers department by description. The pagination is managed by the page parameter and the size parameter.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description:
Direction of entities sorting :
- ASC
- DESC

get.description: This endpoint replace the `getManySuppliers` that is deprecated.

/suppliers/statistic.summary: Get many supplier statistics by several parameters.

get.summary: Get many supplier statistics by several parameters.

/suppliers/search/asList.summary: Return a flux of supplier that corresponding to search value.
/suppliers/search/asList.description: Return a flux of supplier that corresponding to search value.

get.description: get suppliers flux that corresponding of supplier search value.

/suppliers/{supplierId}/leadTime.summary: Get the leadTime for a supplier by the identifier.
/suppliers/{supplierId}/leadTime.description:
Get the leadTime for a supplier by the identifier.

It is the min and the Max of the leadTime (for the set of products).
the leadTime is always in days.

get.summary: Get the leadTime for a supplier by the identifier.
get.description:
Get the leadTime for a supplier by the identifier.

It is the min and the Max of the leadTime (for the set of products).
the leadTime is always in days.

/suppliers/by-departments.summary: Get a list of suppliers by sections
/suppliers/by-departments.description: Get a list of suppliers by sections

get.summary: Get a list of suppliers by sections
get.description: Get a list of suppliers by sections

creationDate.description: Supplier creation date in the database.

isWarehouseForStore.description: Boolean if the supplier is viewed like a "warehouse" by stores.

warehouseId.description: code of the warehouse, when the supplier deliver directly a warehouse (depends on specific circuit)

isMultiSection.description:
Boolean to know if the supplier can have a proposal on several section.
If the value is false, we have to create one proposal by section.

HttpErrorInfo.description: Information returned when an error occurs.

path.description: The path of the resource using.

example.message: The supplier with supplierId=4058621 doesn't not exists.

productCount.description: number of distinct products associated to a supplier

LeadTimeInterval.description:
LeadTime information for a supplier.

It is on a set of products.

max.description: The higher leadtime in all products supplied by the supplier. (in days)

min.description: The lower leadtime in all products supplied by the supplier. (in days)

scopes.rio:register: Necessary for the access to references endpoint.
scopes.rio:monitor: Necessary for the access to env and metrics endpoints.
